#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>




using namespace std;


#define L 40000
#define N 10

int a[L];

void print_factorial(int n) {
    fill(&a[0], &a[L], 0);
    a[L-1] = 1;
    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i += 1) {
        int c = 0;
        for (int j = L-1; j > 0; j -= 1) {
            int d = a[j] * i + c;
            a[j] = d % N; c = d/N;
        }
    }
    int i = 0;
    while (a[i] == 0) i += 1;
    while (i < L) {
        printf("%d", a[i]);
        i += 1;
    }
    printf("\n");
}

int main() {
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    #endif
    int t, n;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while (t != 0) {
        scanf("%d", &n);
        print_factorial(n);
        t -= 1;
    }
    return 0;
}
